code:
import config from'../config';// 请求响应类型定义
// 请求配置接口
// 获取用户认证信息
const getUserAuthHeaders=()=>{const xuserid=localStorage.getItem('xuserid');const xtoken=localStorage.getItem('xtoken');const headers={};if(xuserid){headers['xuserid']=xuserid;}if(xtoken){headers['xtoken']=xtoken;}return headers;};// 创建用户端请求函数
async function createUserRequest(url){let options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};const{timeout=config.api.timeout,...fetchOptions}=options;// 准备请求头
const headers={'Content-Type':'application/json',...getUserAuthHeaders(),// 添加用户认证头
...(fetchOptions.headers||{})};// 创建超时控制
const controller=new AbortController();const timeoutId=setTimeout(()=>controller.abort(),timeout);try{const response=await fetch(url,{...fetchOptions,headers,signal:controller.signal});clearTimeout(timeoutId);// 处理HTTP错误
if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`HTTP Error: ${response.status}`);}// 解析响应数据
const data=await response.json();return data;}catch(error){clearTimeout(timeoutId);if(error instanceof Error){if(error.name==='AbortError'){throw new Error('请求超时');}throw error;}throw new Error('网络错误');}}// 获取用户端API URL
const getUserApiUrl=path=>{const baseUrl=config.api.baseURL.endsWith('/')?config.api.baseURL.slice(0,-1):config.api.baseURL;const cleanPath=path.startsWith('/')?path:`/${path}`;return`${baseUrl}${cleanPath}`;};// 用户认证管理
export const userAuthApi={// 设置用户认证信息
setAuth:(xuserid,xtoken)=>{localStorage.setItem('xuserid',xuserid);localStorage.setItem('xtoken',xtoken);},// 清除用户认证信息
clearAuth:()=>{localStorage.removeItem('xuserid');localStorage.removeItem('xtoken');},// 检查是否已登录
isAuthenticated:()=>{const xuserid=localStorage.getItem('xuserid');const xtoken=localStorage.getItem('xtoken');return!!(xuserid&&xtoken);}};// 公告API
export const announcementApi={// 获取公告信息
getPublicInfo:async()=>{return createUserRequest(getUserApiUrl('/u/get_public_info'),{method:'GET'});}};// 用户信息API
export const userInfoApi={// 获取用户信息
getUserInfo:async()=>{return createUserRequest(getUserApiUrl('/u/get_user_info'),{method:'GET'});}};// 套餐API
export const packageUserApi={// 获取套餐列表
getPackages:async()=>{return createUserRequest(getUserApiUrl('/u/package'),{method:'GET'});}};// 订单API
export const orderUserApi={// 创建订单
createOrder:async package_id=>{return createUserRequest(getUserApiUrl('/u/pay_order'),{method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({package_id})});},// 获取订单列表
getOrders:async()=>{return createUserRequest(getUserApiUrl('/u/pay_order'),{method:'GET'});},// 查询订单支付状态
getPayStatus:async order_id=>{return createUserRequest(getUserApiUrl(`/u/get_pay_status?order_id=${order_id}`),{method:'GET'});}};// 导出所有用户端API
export default{auth:userAuthApi,announcement:announcementApi,userInfo:userInfoApi,package:packageUserApi,order:orderUserApi};
